title: Make TShell available to developers
body: Make TShell available to all developers, not only OEM manufacturers.

comments.body: what parts of tshell make it interesting?  What tools are you looking for here

Only after a correct up to date source this tool, because it's not clear which other OEM toolkits it is also present in other than the DDK, since my use-case is not implicitly driver related even though I want to use it to verify a driver.
